segments.text: I see the woman by the sink, completely absorbed in drying her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her focus is so intense, it's almost as if the rest of the world has faded away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But I can't help but notice the water gushing over the edge of the basin.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s trickling down the cabinet doors, forming a growing puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn’t even seem to realize that her foot is already in the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a sense of urgency as I watch the children behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is trying to reach into the cookie jar, balancing precariously on a wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I gasp internally, worried that any moment he might tip over and fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is right there, looking expectant with her hand raised, hoping for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they know how dangerous their little adventure is.
segments.speaker: PAR
